title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka - Exquisite Temple Earrings
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Adorned with meticulously placed Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Featuring pear-shaped Emerald Hydro and lustrous
freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability.
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette with intricate floral filigree and pavé settings of CZ stones for maximum brilliance. The top features a pear-shaped Emerald Hydro, complemented by delicate pearl accents. A larger pearl dangles gracefully from the bottom of the jhumka, adding a touch of sophistication. The ornate design reflects the aesthetic influences of South Indian temple jewelry.
colors: with a vibrant green Emerald and creamy white pearls
creating a regal and timeless colour palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Adds elegance to both traditional sarees and contemporary Indian wear.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design with modern finesse. The high-quality CZ stones provide a diamond-like sparkle at an accessible price point. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. The durable Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting beauty. These jhumkas are a timeless investment piece that will enhance any jewelry collection.
